name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-samples-msteams-application-qbot
title: QBot
shortDescription: QBot is an innovative solution for Microsoft Teams designed to facilitate intelligent question-and-answer interactions among educators, tutors, and students within classroom settings.
longDescription: QBot leverages Azure Cognitive Services to provide a robust question-and-answer platform within Microsoft Teams, enabling teachers and students to efficiently address each other's inquiries. This solution includes features such as role management, a knowledge base, and tracking capabilities for questions, making it an invaluable tool for educational environments.
